Name: Orkhon Valley Cultural Landscape
Description: Orkhon Valley Cultural Landscape - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Archaeological sites from the 6th-14th centuries including the ancient capital Kharkhorin.

Name: Petroglyphic Complexes of the Mongolian Altai
Description: Petroglyphic Complexes of the Mongolian Altai - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Extensive collection of rock art from the Bronze Age.

Name: Great Burkhan Khaldun Mountain and its surrounding sacred landscape
Description: Great Burkhan Khaldun Mountain - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Sacred mountain where Genghis Khan was born and is believed to be buried.

Name: Landscapes of Dauria
Description: Landscapes of Dauria - UNESCO World Heritage Site. Transboundary steppe ecosystem shared with Russia.
